title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8142.08 - Town of Rotterdam
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8142.08 - Town of Rotterdam

State Regulations
(a) Route 7. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 7 between the Schalmont
entrance/exit of the Rotterdam Industrial Park and IR 88. (b) Route 146. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 146 between Route 7 and the New York State Thruway exit 25
entrance/exit ramp. (c) Route 7. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 7 between the Albany/Schenectady
county line and Route 146. (d) Route 5S. Route 5S between NYS Thruway exit 26 and Route 103 (Lock 9 connection
road). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8142.08

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
